items.text: short of length, jumps at the batsman who pushes it back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: fuller on stumps, driven towards mid-on but straight to the man
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fuller and wider and Mushfiqur slashes at it, gets a thick outside edge which flies over Masakadza at first slip
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: length outside off, opens the face of the bat to run it towards third man
items.shortText: Tiripano to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: length ball, comes forward and defends it towards cover
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: bouncer this time, but Imrul ducks under it quite comfortably
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: slower one, played with soft hands towards mid-on for a quick single
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Saifullah: "BAN V ZIM in mobile and IND V WI in laptop. No other works in progress"
items.text: short of length outside off, Imrul gets on his toes and punches it through covers for a crunching boundary
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, on the pads, worked away towards backward square leg for a single
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, Mushfiqur gets back and drops it on the off side
items.shortText: Chatara to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fuller this time, Mushfiqur comes forward and pushes it towards mid-off and sprints to the other end for a quick run
items.shortText: Chatara to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short of length, Imrul was early into the shot and ends up chipping it towards square leg
items.shortText: Chatara to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: length ball, comes forward and defends
items.postText: Shashank will keep you company for next ten overs.
items.shortText: Chatara to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Thanjs, Hemant. Please ignore the minor glitch we currently have on screen with a pre-ball message regarding Fazle Mahmud.
items.text: angles this full across the stumps, defended.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: drive on the up, just eludes backward point. Saw the width and threw his bat at the delivery.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 2 runs

items.text: length ball angling away, he stands tall and punches to cover point.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.preText: Tafadzwa Mareya: "Jarvis' s economy after two overs was very impressive. I hope zimbabwe gets three more wickets before 100 for them to be in control of the game. Early wickets determine a lot in cricket."
items.text: short but this is way over the batsman's head, left alone without a hassle.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, 1 wide

items.text: slower length delivery angled across, defended from the crease.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: looks to belt this over mid-on, but gets a thick inside edge to the fielder instead.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: beautiful shot. Sees this full, gets underneath the length and goes straight. Launched into the sightscreen. As a batsman, shots like those give you immense satisfaction. The smile told you a story. Friendly half-volley that time, deserved to be put away and this was quite magnificently.
items.shortText: Tiripano to Imrul Kayes, SIX runs

items.preText: Kyle Jarvis is back on the field and comes in to bowl.
items.text: length outside off, steered to square third man
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: floats this full around off stump, driven authoritatively but straight to mid-off.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: off a thick inside edge to square leg. Looked to punch this on the up.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: attacks the stumps with a length ball that veers in late, Mushfiqur tucks this down to fine leg.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: whipped away to deep midwicket for an easy single.
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, 1 run
